title: M(atrix)-Theory Scattering in the Noncommutative (2,0) theory
abstract: We study the Quantum-Mechanics on the hyper-Kahler manifold that is the blow-up of an $A_1$-singularity. This system is relevant for M(atrix)-theory as it was conjectured to describe scattering in the "noncommutative" deformation of a free 5+1D tensor multiplet in the sector with two units of longitudinal light-like momentum.
